Mermaid PowerPoint Add-in

Create and edit beautiful Mermaid diagrams directly in PowerPoint!

📥 Install the Add-in

Download Manifest File

Download the manifest file and follow the installation steps below

🚀 Installation Steps

1. Download the manifest file above
2. Open PowerPoint (Desktop version)
3. Go to Insert → Office Add-ins → Upload My Add-in
4. Select the downloaded manifest-production.xml file
5. Click Upload and the add-in will appear in the ribbon!

✨ Features

📝
Create & Edit
Write Mermaid code and see instant previews
🎯
Smart Editing
Click on existing diagrams to edit their source code
📊
Perfect Integration
Diagrams are inserted as high-quality images with preserved aspect ratio
💾
Persistent Storage
Your diagram source code is saved with the PowerPoint file
